author: djd
msg: DERBY-2007 Add a convenience method in DatabasePropertyTestSetup that returns a decorator
that sets up BUILTIN authentication with the passed in list of users. Use this for the NIST
test as seemed to be the intention under the old harness. Remove the remaining harness properties

author: dblevins
msg: Added generics to SystemInstance.getComponent to remove the cast.

author: chirino
msg: lazy construction of the message exchange was causing timing issues.  Make sure it's constructed in the broker start()
